subject: psychos
author: Ken Thomas
full_text:
--0-1234258377-1176748016=:98417
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

 
  early this morning , strong,perfectly uniform white noise began on am peaking at about 870knz and tropo-ducted along a line from new orleans to chicago.
   
  evp-itc'ers  within 200 miles of that line can probably pick it up.
   
  previously it has continued for about a month, then a weather event happens, notably the katrine hurricane.
   
  this is a natural phenom which may be getting additional artificial stimulus.
   
  previous school shootings have happenned within one week of onset and are possibly an unintended effect.
   
  USG is not doing this but  just about any other powerful group could have something to do with the extra force and artificiality.
   
  early am the live cell phone feed came on spook radio.  we both listened.  couldnt makre sense of it.  one female voice calmly repeating 3 known dead then continuing in more detail
   
  began 9:17am eastern time, whichmay have been a little before news.  800-900 mhz trunk signals accompanied.
   
  after that nothing but mormon tabernacle choir-like chorus repeating 2 words we couldnt make out, for about 2 hrs. white noise over am band continues so expect some natural event around may 16
   
  good example of how evp-itc may eventually earn respectability by making itself useful

--0-1234258377-1176748016=:98417
